body.name: Terra Bamboo Baby Wipes: Pure Water Wipes, 99.7% Pure New Zealand Water, 100% Biodegradable Bamboo Fiber, 0% Plastic, Unscented Baby Wipes for Sensitive Skin, 10 Pack of 24 Wipes

climatePledgeFriendly.details: The Forest Stewardship Council certified products support responsible forestry, helping keep forests healthy for future generations.

features: 🌿 TRANSPARENT INGREDIENTS: CLOTH: 100% Biodegradable FSC Certified Bamboo Fiber (NOT Bamboo Viscose); 0% Plastic. LIQUID: 99.7% Pure New Zealand Purified Water, Hydrolyzed Soy Protein
🌿 PURE & GENTLE: 100% home compostable baby wipes. 0% Plastic, Chemicals, Fragrance, Optical Brighteners or other Harsh Ingredients. Gentle on your baby and their world. Made in New Zealand.

🌿 DERMATOLOGICALLY TESTED: Terra all-natural baby wipes are rated ‘Excellent’ for all skin types by Dermatest. The natural ingredients in our wet wipes help even the most sensitive skin stay nourished and moisturized while protecting against irritation.

🌿 THICK & TEXTURED: Terra biodegradable wipes are durable and extra moist, with an easy dispensing flip-top lid. Cross-woven for a soft cloth-like texture that is non-irritating while cleaning baby's delicate skin.

🌿 EVERYDAY USE: Terra’s sensitive water wipes are formulated for bums, faces, hands and everyday messes at home and on the go. Never tested on animals. As with all baby wipes, these are not flushable.
body.description: Terra Bamboo Baby Wipes with 99.7% Pure NZ Water are strong and durable, yet soft and fresh. The natural ingredients in our bamboo water wipes have been carefully selected to help even the most sensitive skin stay nourished and moisturized while protecting against rash and irritation. Terra All-Natural Sensitive Baby Wipes are 100% Biodegradable FSC Certified Bamboo Fiber, 0% Plastic or other Harsh Chemicals. Terra Baby Wipes are Fragrance-Free and are perfect for baby’s sensitive skin. As with all wipes, these are not flushable baby wipes, however, Terra wipes are 100% compostable and biodegradable. Unlike other natural baby wipes, Terra biodegradable wipes are thick & durable, with an easy dispensing flip-top lid. Cross woven for a soft cloth-like texture that is non-irritating while cleaning baby's delicate skin. Terra all-natural baby wipes are rated ‘Excellent’ for all skin types by Dermatest.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Terra's mission is to use the best of technology, design & nature to create innovative, sustainable products that can be trusted to work. Terra 100% Bamboo Baby Wipes are Perfect for Sensitive Skin! So strong but so fresh. The natural ingredients in Terra bamboo baby wipes have been carefully selected to help even the most sensitive skin stay nourished and moisturized while protecting against rash and irritation. Made from 100% FSC-Certified Bamboo (NOT from Viscose) and 99%+ Pure NZ Water. 0% Plastic, Chemicals, Fragrance, Optical Brighteners or Other Harsh Chemicals. All our products go through intensive testing so you can be sure that Terra water wipes is one of the purest and most natural baby wipes you will ever use. Gentle on your baby and their world.

Large & Textured for Durability Unlike other natural baby wipes, Terra wet wipes are thick, textured & durable to handle even the messiest situations! The soft, cross-woven cloth-like texture is non-irritating while cleaning baby's sensitive skin. Perfect for Everyday Use for all of Life's Messes! Terra sensitive water wipes are formulated for bums, faces, hands and all everyday messes at home and on the go. Great for parents and pets too! Never tested on animals. As with all baby wipes, these are not flushable. Terra 85% Plant-Based Diapers If you love Terra Baby Wipes, you'll definitely love Terra Diapers! They're 85% Plant-Based with 0% Chlorine, Fragrance, Latex, Parabens, Phthalates or Bleach. Not only are they better for baby, they provide up to 30% greater absorbency than leading diaper brands!

Three Different Types of Terra 100% Bamboo Baby Wipes Pure NZ Water Wipes TRANSPARENT INGREDIENTS: CLOTH: 100% Bio-degradable FSC Certified Bamboo Fiber (NOT Bamboo Viscose); 0% Plastic LIQUID: 99.7% Pure New Zealand Purified Water, Hydrolyzed Soy Protein Using crystal clear New Zealand water, our pure water wipes provide a naturally simple, yet nourishing cleanse for your baby. Complemented with soothing Aloe Vera and Vitamin E, these wipes are perfect for sensitive skin. Manuka Honey Baby Wipes TRANSPARENT INGREDIENTS: CLOTH: 100% Bio-degradable FSC Certified Bamboo Fiber (NOT Bamboo Viscose); 0% Plastic LIQUID: 99% Pure New Zealand Purified Water, Hydrolyzed Soy Protein, Organic MG650+ New Zealand Manuka Honey Terra Manuka Honey Wipes contain liquid gold that can only be produced in New Zealand. Our locally sourced MG650+ Manuka Honey is amazing for moisturizing with great anti-inflammatory effects, perfect for delicate, sensitive skin. Kiwifruit Extract Baby Wipes TRANSPARENT INGREDIENTS: CLOTH: 100% Bio-degradable FSC Certified Bamboo Fiber (NOT Bamboo Viscose); 0% Plastic LIQUID: 99% Pure New Zealand Purified Water, Hydrolyzed Soy Protein, Kiwifruit Extract As a New Zealand based business, we're no strangers to taking natural kiwi ingredients and making great products out of them. A staple in the New Zealand kitchen, kiwifruit is rich in vitamins and the extract provides natural moisturizing and cleansing benefits for your skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Super small packages
reviews.reviewText: These are RIDICULOUSLY small packages and the wipes are hard to get out.I love their regular size wipes though.
